title.rendered: Pat Cannie | Managing Director – Marine – Middle East & India

content.rendered:
Pat is a Marine Engineer who holds a U.K. Class 1 Motor Chief Engineer’s certificate with diesel power station management experience. Resident in Dubai since May 1986 as a surveyor on behalf of P&I Clubs, Hull & Machinery Underwriters, Ship Owners and Managers, Ship Repairers and Maritime Law Firms.

Discipline: Engineer
Specialism: Investigation of significant/contentious war damages, cargo and ballast tank explosions, groundings and salvage, ER flooding and collision damages
Expert Witness Expertise: Expert reports, Arbitration

Contact

Dubai | +971 (0)50 645 5968
